orig_text: The following is an example of a Permission-Missing header field:
correct_text:
If the URI contains a comma, question mark or semicolon, the
URI MUST be enclosed in angle brackets (< and >).

The following is an example of a Permission-Missing header field:
notes: Comma and semicolon can cause decode ambiguities when the header contains addr-spec values instead of name-addr values.  For consistency with RFC 3261 section 20, the same bracket rule is indicated to resolve the ambiguity.
